q: Two trains started at the same time from two stations which are 200 km apart and going in opposite direction, the trains cross each other at the distance of 110 km from one of the stations. What is the ratio of their speeds?

The jogging track in a sports complex is 726 m in circumference. John and Tara started from the same point and walked in the opposite direction in 4.5 km/hr and 3.75 km/hr respectively. At what time will they meet each other for the first time?
A passenger train covers a distance of 300 km two hours earlier if its speed is increased by 5 km/hr from its normal speed. What is the regular speed of the train?
Fred walks at the rate of 4 km/hr for 2 hr 45 min and covers a certain distance. If he runs at the speed of 16.5 km/hr, then what is the time required to cover the same distance?
William travels a distance in 1hr 24 min by covering \( \frac{2}{3}th \) of the distance starting at 4 km/hr and the rest at 5 km/hr. What is the total distance covered?
